sources.description: Title: A Man's Land Summary: Tex Mason and Peggy Turner each inherit one half of the Triple X Ranch. Thomas wants the ranch and he has Triple X hand Joe let his men rustle their cattle. Tex not only has to fight the ... Directed by: Phil Rosen Actors: Hoot Gibson, Marion Shilling, Robert Ellis Production Company: M.H. Hoffman Inc. Release Date: 11 June 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White Tex Mason and Peggy Turner each inherit one half of the Triple X Ranch. Thomas wants the ranch and he has Triple X hand Joe let his men rustle their cattle. Tex not only has to fight the rustlers, he must also contend with Easterner Peggy's idea of what a ranch should be.

sources.title: A Man's Land (1932) HOOT GIBSON
sources.description:
Stars: Hoot Gibson, Marion Shilling, Robert Ellis 
 Director: Phil Rosen

 Tex Mason and Peggy Turner each inherit one half of the Triple X Ranch. Thomas wants the ranch and he has Triple X hand Joe let his men rustle their cattle. Tex not only has to fight the rustlers, he must also contend with Easterner Peggy's idea of what a ranch should be.

metadata.Plot: Tex Mason and Peggy Turner each inherit one half of the Triple X Ranch. Thomas wants the ranch and he has Triple X hand Joe let his men rustle their cattle. Tex not only has to fight the rustlers, he must also contend with Easterner Peggy's idea of what a ranch should be.
metadata.Actors: Hoot Gibson, Marion Shilling, Robert Ellis
